articles.author: Shreyashi Sanyal
articles.title: Most Asia markets turn lower; Japan business sentiment improves - CNBC
articles.description: Asia-Pacific markets inched lower extending losses from the previous session. Investors monitoring economic data for direction.
articles.content:
Global equities look situated for a significant rally in the new year should central banks begin easing monetary policy and the Federal Reserve manage a soft landing, according to HSBC.
